name: Ragged child
message: To where no one can hurt me

name: Ragged child
message: There are worst things in this city... the more money they have the less human they are

name: Ragged child
message: Hope you don't end up being one of their puppets, but I really think you are a lost cause

name: Ragged child
message: It doesn't matter, nothing matters now, farewell stranger
